Sequence Information.Family: Belongs to the frog skin active peptide family (Brevinin subfamily)
Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.15325526]Gram-negative bacteria:Escherichia coli (MIC=25 µM), Pseudomonas aeruginosa (MIC=25 µM), Enterobacter cloacae (MIC=25 µM), Klebsiella pneumoniae (MIC>50 µM), Proteus mirabilis (MIC>50 µM);Gram-positive bacteria:Staphylococcus aureus (MIC=3 µM), Staphylococcus epidermidis (MIC=6 µM), Enterococcus faecalis (MIC=6 µM), Streptococcus Group B (MIC=13 µM);Yeast:Candida albicans (MIC=3 µM).
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information found in the reference(s) presented
Sequence Information.Function: Activity against a range of Gram-positive and Gram-negative bacteria, and also shows hemolytic activity.

Literature.Title: Host-defense peptides isolated from the skin secretions of the Northern red-legged frog Rana aurora aurora.
Literature.Author: Conlon JM, Sonnevend A, Davidson C, Demandt A, Jouenne T.
